name: Jazzy.pro
description:
Jazzy Pro develop business solutions that increase your client’s level of satisfaction in real time. How? By implementing cognitive technology to improve your soft skills and make communication with your customers better, every day, minute after minute. Jazzy Pro, a company that creates packaged and custom IT solutions for customers around the world. Jazzy is a team of talented people who deliver fresh technology, designs and ideas.
Founded in 2010, Jazzy Innovations won the Judges & Audience award at the Startup Weekend Krakow 2012, won the “From Idea to Business” award at Malopolska Technology Trends 2013 and won the IBM Virtual Hackathon 2015, among other awards.
